name: texture colors
desc: The texture_colors module does high-quality coloring based on texturing.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Texture By
properties.desc: The Texture By control allows the user to set how the texture of the output should be determined.

properties.name: Data Component
properties.desc: The Data Component selects which nodal data to texture.

properties.name: Cell Data Component
properties.desc: If Texture By is set to Cell Data the Cell Data Component selects which cell data will set the texture.

properties.name: Texture Resolution
properties.desc: Texture Resolution determines the number of colors utilized in the texture map for coloring. Higher resolutions create smoother coloring, but at the expense of memory and compute/rendering time.

properties.name: Separate Cells
properties.desc: If Texture By is set to cell data, this option will ensure that no cells are sharing nodes this can prevent blurring affects.

properties.name: Max Edge Angle
properties.desc: The Max Edge Angle angle is defined as the angle between two faces or cells in the model.

properties.name: Input Z Scale
properties.desc: The Input Z Scale is the vertical exaggeration of the input object.
